name: Cannondale Jekyll 27.5 Bicycle - Women's
description: From flowy single track, to gnarly rock gardens, this all-mountain machine is ready to hit the trails. Equipped with 27.5 in. wheels, you get the agility of a 26er on the descents and the smooth roll of a 29er on the climbs. SRAM GX groupset efficiently delivers your power to the trail with smooth, instant gear changes. And Fox suspension eats up the drops and softens the landings should you feel like getting sendy.BallisTec carbon frame with SmartForm C1 alloy rear triangle with Ai offset, slack headtube angle and versatile trail geometry.Fox Float 36 fork with the FIT4 damper, 3-postion adjustability and 170mm of travel.Fox Float DPS EVOL rear shock with Gemini dual mode air spring (Flow Mode - 165mm / Hustle Mode - 130mm) and 3-postion adjustability.1x12 drive train pairs a 30T chain ring with an 11-50T cassette.SRAM Eagle GX and NX groupset, with a Truvativ Stylo crankset.SRAM Guide R hydraulic disc brakes, with 180mm rotor out back and a 203mm up front.Dropper seat post with bar mounted control lever.Front tire: Maxxis Minion DHF EXO 29 x 2.5 (tubeless ready).Rear tire: Maxxis Minion DHR II EXO 29 x 2.4 (tubeless ready).Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase.

Frame: BallisTec Carbon front triangle with Smartform C1 Alloy swingarm
Tires: Maxxis Minion DHF MaxxTerra EXO 27.5 x 2.5 / Maxxis Minion DHR II EXO 27.5 x 2.4
